title: Praise to Him by whose kind favor
author: Carl M. Von Weber

verses.text:
Praise to Him by whose kind favor
Heavenly truth has reached our ears;
May its sweet reviving savor
Fill our hearts and calm our fears.

Truth! how sacred is the treasure!
Teach us, Lord, its worth to know;
Vain the hope and short the pleasure
Which from other sources flow.

What of truth we have been hearing,
Fix, O Lord, within our heart;
In the day of thy appearing
May we have an humble part.

Till we leave this world forever,
May we 'neath thine influence die;
This our aim, our sole endeavor,
Thine to live, for thine to die.
